body:
Is there a way or command to be use to find files using a list of files to be find in a directory?
e.g.

find the following files: 
  
text1.sql
  
text2.sql
  
text3.sql
  
text4.sql
  
text5.sql
  
text6.sql

Search in: c:\archive...
title: Perforce P4v: How to find file with a list of file to be find?
